item.title: ReactPHP 源码阅读：EventLoop
item.description: 最近一直在忙工作上的事情，没有时间更新文章。今天抽空来更新一篇。今天我们来了解并阅读一下ReatPHP的源码。 根据ReatPHP官网的介绍，我们可以了解到这是一个类似于JavaScript的“事件驱动”编程框架。 ReactPHP is a low-level library for event-driven programming in PHP. At its core is an event loop, on top of which it provides low-level utilities, such as: Streams abstraction, async DNS resolver, network client/server, HTTP client/server and interaction with processes.
